pages.text: The $(item)Corporea Solidifier$(0) acts as a replacement for the $(item)Corporea Retainer$(0). When placed next to a $(item)Corporea Interceptor$(0), the $(item)Corporea Solidifier$(0), instead of remembering the interceptor's request, will create a $(thing)Corporea Ticket$(0) containing the item and item count of the request.

The $(thing)Corporea Ticket$(0) will be placed in an inventory one or two blocks below the $(item)Solidifier$(0), or placed on-top of none are available, much like a $(item)Corporea Funnel$(0).

The $(item)Sanvocalia$(0) functional flower seems to be particularly interested in the energies in these $(thing)Corporea Tickets$(0).
